testCaseId: a945dd26-d7d4-49a4-ab23-57f3f954c8a0-การสื่อสารและการนำเสนอเชิงเทคนิค
question: อยากทำงานที่ผสมเทคโนโลยีกับความคิดสร้างสรรค์ แต่ไม่อยากเขียนโค้ดเยอะ ควรเรียนอะไรดี
skill: การสื่อสารและการนำเสนอเชิงเทคนิค

evaluations.subjectName: วิศวกรรมซอฟต์แวร์
evaluations.reason: Course includes communication and presentation of software work as a learning outcome, but the main focus is software engineering, so communication is a component, not the main theme.

evaluations.subjectName: ปฏิบัติการสร้างสรรค์เพื่อการกินดีอยู่ดี
evaluations.reason: Course explicitly includes communication through visual storytelling and presentation as a core learning outcome, directly related to technical communication and presentation skills.

evaluations.subjectName: พลังงานแสงอาทิตย์
evaluations.reason: Course includes ability to communicate and present academic work, but focus is on solar energy concepts; communication is a useful but secondary skill.

evaluations.reason: Course emphasizes effective academic communication, presentation, and expression of scientific knowledge as a primary learning outcome, highly relevant to technical communication and presentation.

evaluations.reason: Course explicitly includes effective communication of project work through writing and presentation as a core learning outcome, highly relevant to technical communication and presentation.

Course focuses on skills in communication and presentation of academic work as a primary learning outcome, highly relevant to technical communication and presentation.
